title: ClearTriage Environment Overview

content.content: As a ScaleSec contractor, here's what you need to know about ClearTriage's specific environment.

items: **Pete Allen (CTO/ISSO)** - Your primary technical contact for all security and incident matters
**Savvy (Senior Engineer)** - Secondary technical contact when Pete is unavailable
**Shelly (Office Manager/FedRAMP Coordinator)** - Documentation and audit coordination

content.content: Dave (President) handles VA communications. Braden (Engineer) and Krista (Sales) have limited technical involvement.
**AWS Services**: Fargate/ECS, Aurora PostgreSQL, ElastiCache, S3/CloudFront, WAF, GuardDuty, Security Hub, Inspector, IAM Identity Center, CloudWatch, Incident Manager
**Access**: You'll use AWS IAM Identity Center. No SSH to production (everything is serverless/managed).
FedRAMP boundary: AWS services listed in SSP + Google Drive for compliance docs. Nothing else.

items: LI-SaaS impact level (we only store username, password hash, email)
No PHI/medical records - just nurse triage protocols
VA is primary customer - system used by VA nurses
6-person fully remote team - expect direct Slack communication
Multi-tenant architecture with logical data separation

keyTakeaways: Pete is your primary contact, Savvy is backup, Shelly handles documentation
Everything runs on AWS managed services - familiarize yourself with our specific stack
We're LI-SaaS because we store minimal data (login credentials only)
Direct communication via Slack - no formal ticketing system
